name: Red and Blue Stickman 2
description:
Good news for red and blue stickman game fans. The next version of the game has officially launched. Many exciting new improvements and challenges will make you addicted and unable to take your eyes off.

This is an addictive platform puzzle game, where you have to control two characters synchronously. Control both creatures at the same time and activate buttons to move platforms, push boxes and collect diamonds to get to the exit door of the forest temple?
It's addictive and very fun to play with your kids or your friends. Have a good time with fire boy and water girl!

In this cool teamwork game, Red Stickman can control powerful flames while his friend, Water Blue Stickman keeps things cool with her awesome aquatic abilities. Redboy can slide across frosty surfaces but this hot boy is going to have a hard time climbing up any slopes that have snow on them. He’ll slide right off. Meanwhile, Bluegirl gets slowed down whenever her feet touch flat areas covered in fire. Snowy slopes are no problem for this cool girl, though.
She can blast right them up! So this dynamic duo is going to once again need to team up while they jump across all of the temple’s platforms and race towards each exit door. It’s the only way for Red Boy and Blue girl to make it through all the levels and collect tons of precious, color-coded jewels along the way. They’re bound to encounter lots of traps and puzzles, too, and that’s where you come in.

Features of Red and Blue Stickman 2 Animation
- Various maps and levels are being updated frequently
- Easy but addictive teamwork gameplay
- Nice characters and design
- Smooth control

How to play Red and Blue Stickman 2: Forest Temple Maze
- Move Fireboy and Ice Water girl by arrows and avoid obstacles. A red boy must avoid the water while a Blue girl must avoid the fire.
- Just tap the button "Swap" to change from Water blue girl stick to Fire red boy
- Collect gems as many as possible

Download Red And Blue Stickman: Forest Temple Maze now! Help Hotboy and Cool girl get through each level quickly in this challenging game. Do not waste your time, and get started on your journey right away!
